column7: Directed independent research or creative activity. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: Junior standing in art and design; and consent of instructor, advisor, and associate director of the School.

column11: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
